page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This area is on the fringe of the Lake District National Park.It is part of the Furness Peninsula and ajoins Morecambe Bay.The market town of Ulverston is nearby and Croftlands Estate, on the outskirts of the town, comes within our area.The other major area of population is Bardsea Village. Unemployment is not a major problem many of the adult male and female population are employed by either Glaxochem or Vickers Shipbuilding and both are firms which have not been hit by the recession, others are employed on farms or in service industries including tourism.The population is not multi-racial and in many ways is shielded from the general problems of society in Britain in 1985.
